original_text: The Lord said to me, “Son of man, look carefully, listen closely and give attention to everything I tell you concerning all the regulations and instructions regarding the temple of the Lord. Give attention to the entrance to the temple and all the exits of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 인자야 너는 전심으로 주목하여 내가 네게 말하는 바 여호와의 성전의 모든 규례와 모든 율례를 귀로 듣고 또 성전의 입구와 성소의 출구를 전심으로 주목하고

sentences.original_text: and give attention to everything I tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 말하는 모든 것에 유의하라

sentences.original_text: concerning all the regulations and instructions
regarding the temple of the Lord.
Give attention to the entrance to the temple
and all the exits of the sanctuary."
